message.body: I hope the weather didn't wreak too much havoc on your commute today!

It wasn't too bad. I was prepared with the rainboots and umbrella. But it was insane. Everything was and still is flooded. How about you? Did you go to work? I imagine people were driving very....dumb.

Hahah I didn't have to go outside yesterday (thank goodness). I was going to but after hearing what was going on outside, I decided to barricade myself inside instead. But as I was driving to work today, I saw a good amount if flooding in Jersey. Craziness.
I know. I heard on the news they were saying if you have to go to work, leave a lot earlier. Craziness.
